oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dramatic Club, 1929
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: [Yearbook staff, Midlander]
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A page from the Midlander yearbook for the 1928-1929 academic year. Cameo portraits at top of page of the faculty sponsor and student officers of the college dramatic club. A second photo shows the cast of an unspecified production on stage.

Top photo: Annette Gannaway, Elizabeth Stephenson, Elmer Malone, Joe B. Snoddy and Rebecca J. Buchannan, sponsor. Bottom photo: Ola Anderson, Hazel Areldge, Madline Berry, Melven Charles, Martha Clendenin, W. Lee Cunningham, Elizabeth Davis, Row Dowdy, Julian Ligette, Edna Long, Mary E. Moore, Marie Pardue, Frances Sade, Anne Sory, Lida Stiles, Wilma Towry, Elsie Vickers, Ethel Walker, Eva Weakley, T.B. Webb, Jr.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: College and student drama;
